tagline.title: Bali Besakih and Lempuyang Tour Is One Day Tour For Explore Mother Temple of Besakih Temple and Visit Lempuyang Temple with Gate of Heaven
tagline.text: BALI BESAKIH AND LEMPUYANG TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR FOR EXPLORE MOTHER TEMPLE OF BESAKIH TEMPLE AND VISIT LEMPUYANG TEMPLE WITH GATE OF HEAVEN
tagline.html: Bali Besakih and Lempuyang Tour Is One Day Tour For Explore Mother Temple of Besakih Temple and Visit Lempuyang Temple with Gate of Heaven

description.text: Bali Besakih and Lempuyang Touris a Bali Full Day Tour Packages to enjoy visiting the biggest temple on the island of Bali, namely Besakih Temple and followed by visiting Lempuyang Temple and taking pictures at the Gate of Heaven which is very instagramable. A very religious experience as well as an instagramable trip, a very perfect combination, where you will see the biggest and sanctified temples by Hindus in Bali and take pictures in very instagrammable places such as the gate of heaven and the tirta gangga water palace. As for the adventure starting in the morning, we will be picked up by our tour driver and go straight to Lempuyang Temple which is also often known as the Gate of Heaven, Lempuyang Temple is one of the temples from the Sad Kahyangan range which serves to protect the island of Bali from all negative influences, here you have a gate that is often used to take pictures, this gate the name is Gate of heaven which is located at Penataran Agung Lempuyang temple, the journey continues to Tirta Gangga Water Palace to see the beauty of the garden with a koi fish pond which is a relic of the king of Karangase m in ancient times which functioned as a place of recreation for the royal family, here you can walk around seeing the beauty of the very beautiful garden and take pictures in the middle of the pond while surrounded by koi fish which will make the photos very instagramable, then proceed to the restaurant to enjoy lunch with very delicious Indonesian food, after lunch we directly go to the Besakih Temple which is located in the eastern area of the island of Bali and see the charm of beauty on the way to Besakih, arriving at the Besakih Temple you will start a religious adventure to see the cluster of sacred temples that located here and after that the journey continues back to the hotel you by bringing a very impressive experience in this Bali Besakih and Lempuyang Tour, accompanied by a very experienced and friendly tour driver will make this one day tour to Besakih and Lempuyang very enjoyable and will certainly make your day full of meaning
